Body.Content:
We recently announced updates to the business continuity and disaster recovery capabilities of Dynamics 365 and Power Platform. These new capabilities provide added resiliency for mission critical workloads and flexible options for customers to implement business continuity strategies.

How does this affect me?
Customers need to maintain documented business continuity and disaster recovery plans for their organizations. We want to let you know about these changes so you can update your plans if needed. These changes will go into effect on April 30, 2025.

What do I need to do to prepare?
Please review the updated business continuity and disaster recovery documentation. For additional context on these changes see the blog post for Managed Availability.

Title: Updates to business continuity and disaster recovery capabilities of Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
